title: Yetho Yethotho Lyrics Maruthavelu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Mathangi 
Song: Yetho Yethotho
MOvie: Maruthavelu
Music: James Vasanth
Lyrics: Mohanraj

Yetho Yethotho ennam vandhu 
Thoondil meenagiren
Yenno yenono thookamengum
Undhan binbam kaanugiren
Thottu pogum unswasakaatrai katti podoven
Naan katti pottu en sondham endru 
Uyirile mooduven ...

Kaadhal Kanthaanam seidhadhrenru
Enakul unnai paarkiren
Thookam indri en porvayodu 
Udhan kadhaiyai pesukiren
Endhan kanavu ne vandhu theenda
Kangal vizhikiren
Oh .. naagam pola en kannam engum
regai naan kaangiren

Thooral podum, paarvai podhum
Unnai bommaiyaki en veetil vaithu
Pootikulla vendum.
NIllamale kaalgal rendum
Engengume thaavyie oduthe...
Ennagumo ennennaagumo unnal maari pogiren

Naanul nanendru namba villai
ennai ne maatrinaai
Kaalai maalai ennule vandhu
Kalveesi odukindrai
Muttru pulli illadha aasai nenjil poothatho
En ellai kodu unnale indru kollai poginradho

[Thooral podum, paarvai podhum
Unnai bommaiyaki en veetil vaithu
Pootikulla vendum.
NIllamale kaalgal rendum
Engengume thaavyie oduthe...
Ennagumo ennennaagumo unnal maari pogiren] (2)

seo.title: Yetho Yethotho Lyrics Maruthavelu Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Yetho Yethotho Lyrics Maruthavelu Song Lyrics from Maruthavelu. Read the lyrics penned by Mohanraj and composed by James Vasanthan and sung by Mathangi. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Mohanraj, Maruthavelu, James Vasanthan, Mathangi, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
